title: Adobe Profile - AJO Entities

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Campaign ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Campaign ID. Keeps unchanged even after republishing.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Campaign Version ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Campaign Version ID. Changes on republishing. Represents immutable version of campaign.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Channel/Message Entity
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Channel/Message Entity Specific Fields. Denormalized on variantId

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Message ID. Does not change when message is edited.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Message Name. Refers to the referred version of messagePublciationID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message Publication ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Message Publication ID. Represents a frozen/published version of message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Channel's variant ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Is not frozen and might remain same between different versions of message publication.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Treatment ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: This along with experimentId has one to one mapping with messageID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Experiment ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: This along with treatmentId has one to one mapping with messageID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Journey Version ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Represents a frozen version of a Journey
